page.title: 10A Local Farmer.
page.content: My dad works in farming. He gets up at seven o'clock in the morning to feed the animals. We own fifty cows, twenty five yearling heifers and thirty beef heifers and bullocks. My dad owns five tractors, a combined harvester, a seed drill, a round baler, a forage harvester, a reversible plough, two muck spreaders, a rotivater, a J.C.B, a mechanical digger, a crop sprayer, a fertiliser sprayer and five hydraulic tipping trailers. We own three hundred and sixty five acres. Two hundred and twenty acres are used for cereals and the rest for grass. We own three farms and all have Porters living there. The farm that I live on is called Manor Farm and is in Teversal. We own another farm in Teversal called Teversal Farm and another near Pleasley called Hill Farm. There are
